name: GitHub
description: Connect repositories, pull requests, issues, and workflows for code-aware agents.
authMethod: OAuth app with repo and workflow scopes

name: Slack
description: Enable agents to post updates, read channels, and react to workspace events.
authMethod: OAuth bot token + optional user token

name: Linear
description: Manage issues, cycles, and projects with queryable workflows for planning agents.
authMethod: OAuth authorization code with workspace scopes

name: Notion
description: Sync docs and databases so agents can read and update shared knowledge.

name: Datadog
description: Give agents observability access for metrics, alerts, and incident triage.

name: Stripe
description: Power billing, subscription reporting, and payment operations in agent workflows.

name: Webhook Relay
description: Receive external events and route them into real-time autonomous routines.

name: Discord Events
description: Trigger agent actions from chat activity, mentions, and slash-command callbacks.

name: MCP Filesystem
description: Grant controlled local filesystem access through an MCP server adapter.

name: Legacy Jira Bridge
description: Older Jira bridge kept for compatibility with previous agent workflows.
